data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Priority tiers (members first)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

requestBody.title: Create and publish offer version Snapshot

data.instruction: Create a published offer version with realistic duration and base price for this UC.
data.expectedResult: Offer version exists and is ready for booking order references.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Fee policy if offer is declined after acceptance". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
